title: A Priest’s Legend - Novel Updates
author: Diao Yan De   Holding A Cigarette In Mouth   叼烟的
description: This is a story about a normal priest’s adventure in Continent Sunk. A priest Silence often stroke monsters alone in some area to obtain experiences leveling up needed  for a long time. However, the common days passed by shortly after he found a Chaos Ring, which was able to help him swift from a holy priest curing teammates or himself (but he did occasionally team up with other players) to a dark priest enjoying a attack power matching to a mage distinguished as an extraordinary magic attack and AOE. Therefore, he began to strive hard for collecting the full set of Chaos outfit.>
